summary.span: 命名空间提供让你能够将数据对象绑定到 ASP.NET Web 窗体服务器控件的类。

span.span: The namespace provides classes that enable you to bind data objects to ASP.NET Web Forms server controls.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有关如何在 Web 窗体中使用模型绑定的教程系列，请参阅[模型绑定和 Web 窗体](/aspnet/web-forms/overview/presenting-and-managing-data/model-binding/retrieving-data)。For a tutorial series on using model binding with Web Forms, see [Model Binding and Web Forms](/aspnet/web-forms/overview/presenting-and-managing-data/model-binding/retrieving-data).
